title: Google\Cloud\Translate\V3\Glossary\LanguageCodesSet
name: LanguageCodesSet
description:
Used with equivalent term set glossaries.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.translation.v3.Glossary.LanguageCodesSet

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.language_codes
params.description: The BCP-47 language code(s) for terms defined in the glossary. All entries are unique. The list contains at least two entries. Expected to be an exact match for GlossaryTerm.language_code.

methods.name: getLanguageCodes
methods.description:

All entries are unique. The list contains at least two entries. Expected to be an exact match for GlossaryTerm.language_code.
